# Bless Weapon, Swift (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 swift action

**Components:** V

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Weapon touched

**Duration:** 1 round

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 31

*You invoke the holy words quickly, and your weapon flashes a momentary blue-white radiance.*

This spell functions like *[[Bless Weapon (Spell)|bless weapon]]*, except as noted above.
